mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.material_class_sid, t.node_code, t.node_name, t.node_type, t.level, t.node_short_name, t.parent_code_sid, t.material_category, t.node_sort, t.remark, t.status, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.zipper_flag, t1.node_name as parent_code_name, t1.node_code as parent_code_code, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.name AS node_type_name from s_con_material_class t LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t1 ON t1.material_class_sid = t.parent_code_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN s_con_material_type t3 ON t3.code = t.node_type
mapper.insert:
insert into s_con_material_class
client_id, material_class_sid, node_code, node_name, node_type, level, node_short_name, parent_code_sid, material_category, node_sort, remark, status, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys, zipper_flag,
values

mapper.select: SELECT d2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.material_class_sid, IF(find_in_set(t1.parent_code_sid, @pids) > 0, @pids := concat(@pids, ',', t1.material_class_sid), 0) AS leafNodeId FROM (SELECT d1.material_class_sid, d1.parent_code_sid FROM s_con_material_class d1) t1, (SELECT @pids := ${materialClassSid} ) t2 ) t3 INNER JOIN s_con_material_class d2 ON d2.material_class_sid = t3.material_class_sid WHERE t3.leafNodeId != 0
